demoScreen.title: What’s In This Stack?
demoScreen.tagLine: Congratulations, you’ve got a very advanced React Native app template here.  Take advantage of this boilerplate!
demoScreen.androidReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running, run adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 from your terminal, and reload the app.
demoScreen.iosReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running and reload app.
